abstract: Driven column review of Toyota 2015 Yaris.
lead_paragraph: Many cars in this segment now offer luxuries like keyless ignition, rear-view cameras and heated leather seats. Don’t look for them in the Yaris.
snippet: Many cars in this segment now offer luxuries like keyless ignition, rear-view cameras and heated leather seats. Don’t look for them in the Yaris.

headline.main: Video Review: The 2015 Yaris Is Toyota’s Bare-Bones Budget Car
headline.print_headline: Some Budget Cars Offer Luxuries. Don’t Look for Them in the 2015 Yaris.
